Gurkhabasti, P/O, Kathalbagan, Agartala, West Tripura District, Tripura, Pin 799006.
Subject: - Formation of Producer Company during FY 2025-26 under AHVY Scheme-reg.

Sir/Madam,

The Competent authority has approved the formation of Producer Company in the following cluster for implementation of cluster activities to ensure active participation and contribution of member artisans to develop long term sustainable business model through a formal organized setup.

Sl. No.Name of the Facilitating IACluster Area, District, StateName of CraftNo. Of Artisans to be covered
1Tripura Womens Welfare Society TWWSWest Tripura, Tripura.Jute Crafts250

The member artisans [minimum being 75% artisans] being the shareholders of the producer companies will actively own and participate and contribute for the successful business entity. The producer companies should be formed as per the Companies Act and other applicable laws. The formation of company may be completed at the earliest and registration Certificate, certified MOA & Bye-Law etc. must be forwarded to this office without fail
a) **Minimum requirement to form a producer company:** 15 or more members [minimum being 75% artisans].
b) **Pre-registration requirements** to form producer company: Minimum number of 5 directors may be identified from the 15 members.
c) **Post-registration requirements** - IA is required to provide the baseline survey details mentioning the complete list of artisans covered by the Producer Company.
d) **Timeline for issuing share holding certificate** to all member artisans of the Producer Company must be submitted.
e) **Facilitating IA must ensure that the producer companies get registered before 30.06.2025.**
Need based interventions on case to case basis will be provided on receiving of registration Certificate, certified MOA & Bye-Law etc. by this office subject to availability of funds.
This issues with the approval of Development Commissioner [Handicrafts].
Yours faithfully

[D: V Sreenatha]
Sr. Asst. Director[CC]
Copy to:-
1. The Asst. Director[H], AGARTALA, O/o the DC[Handicrafts], AGARTALA
